item.title: Punk Rock playlist for 12/2012
item.description: Including: Bad Religion, Cloud Four, Cock Sparrer, Flipper, Hot Water Music, Nofx, Rancid, Rise Against, Scream, The Exploding Hearts.

item.description: Including: Against Me!, Franky Lee, No Use For A Name, Old Flings, Sharks, Spraynard, Tartar Control, The Draft, The Riot Before, The Soviettes.

item.description: Including: Against Me!, Anchors, Banner Pilot, Classics Of Love, Hot Water Music, Mixtapes, Ramshackle Glory, Strike Anywhere, The Gaslight Anthem, The Riot Before.

item.description: Including: A Wilhelm Scream, All, Anti-Flag, Bouncing Souls, Dillinger Four, Fucked Up, Lagwagon, The Clash, The Gaslight Anthem, The Loved Ones.

item.title: Punk Rock playlist for 5/2012
item.description: Including: About The Mess, Alkaline Trio, Delay, Dropkick Murphys, Lawrence Arms, Lipstick Homicide, Rites Of Spring, The Menzingers, The Offspring, Tom Gabel Of Against Me!.

item.description: Including: Apologies, I Have None, Jawbreaker, Lemuria, Planes Mistaken For Stars, Social Distortion, Super Soaked, Tedxsalford, The Flatliners, The Front Bottoms, Verse.

item.description: Including: Alkaline Trio, Cock Sparrer, Crusades, Dillinger Four, Future Of The Left, Joyce Manor, Larry And His Flask, Leftover Crack, Lifetime, The Dopamines.
